sense.name: gross income before deductions
sense.examples: The iPod has generated a lot of revenue for Apple. We receive revenue each month from our rental properties. The revenue Mary is receiving from her small bakery is not enough to offset expenses.

sense.name: income collected as tax by a government
sense.examples: The government gained revenue last year by raising the capital gains tax. The black market doesn't generate much revenue for the government. Many different streams of revenue fund the various government agencies.

sense.name: a government department concerned with collecting tax revenue
sense.examples: John worked at Revenue for twelve years. Neither GOA or Revenue was made aware of this issue.
